outstanding.translation[0].definitions[0: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
outstanding.translation[0].definitions[1: not yet done, solved, or paid
We’ve got quite a few debts still outstanding.
outstanding.translation[0].definitions[2: The question of who is in charge is of outstanding importance.
outstanding.translation[1].definitions[0: a company’s outstanding shares are all the shares that it has sold and that are held by its shareholders
It will have 14.4 million shares outstanding after the offering.
The company wants to raise the $5 million from employees purchasing some of its outstanding junk bonds.
outstanding.translation[1].definitions[1: outstanding loans, debts etc are ones that have not been paid yet
Proceeds from the sale are expected to pay the company’soutstanding debts.
The landlord took out a warrant in respect of the outstanding rent.
outstanding.translation[1].definitions[2: not solved, done, or dealt with
Only queries still outstanding after this stage should be referred to the Help Desk.
The committee reached broad agreement on all outstanding issues.
